hi,晟哥。"coverage/coveralls" told me that I failed, the "Details" are "UNCOVERED EXISTING LINES :  	apm-sniffer/apm-sdk-plugin/spring-plugins/core-patch/src/main/java/org/apache/skywalking/apm/plugin/spring/patch/AopExpressionMatchInterceptor.java", but I had just amended doc, I checked "Files changed" which is (README_ZH.md,Abstract-CN.md), I don't know why this happened.
Don't worry about coverage.

[北京车和家信息技术有限责任公司](http://www.chehejia.com)

目前正在线下环境测试、验证，Agent采用5.0.0.0-RC，Collector和UI使用5.0.0.0-beta2
ok

@wu-sheng  Hi ,  how should  I  debug to ouput of the data . I  am  sure I use the newest Zipkin . 
https://github.com/openzipkin/brave-webmvc-example   
webmvc4 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6898355/43306180-dc0f9a74-91ac-11e8-9c75-1890e6cf3e5c.png)

And I only change this .
Amorf   is my friend .
 Amorf是服务端人员 ，我负责java开发 。 你说要debug 一下，那么我应该修改哪里才能打印收到数据的日志？
还有我确定我用的是最新的zipkin  除了这个地址修改，其他地方我都没用动到Zipkin 示例代码

See `SpanProcessor` to check whether `#buffer` is right. The parser is powered by official zipkin lib. So shouldn't have problem.

FYI @adriancole if you have any clue, leave message here.

the error message has "binaryAnnotations" in it. That is v1 structure, so it should be the /api/v1/spans endpoint. Even better to make sure v2 json is sent. This is ensured if you use recent brave/recent zipkin-reporter
if using php, https://github.com/openzipkin/zipkin-php uses v2 format as well

Here is new data contains segment data.Please check it.
[data.tar.gz](https://github.com/apache/incubator-skywalking/files/2235178/data.tar.gz)
@amoyf Then you may need Molten project's help. I am closing this again.
I'm so sorry that I cliked on the "Update branch" by accident, and I do not know what does that button means.
@ascrutae This is a potential plugin issue.

@wu-sheng @adriancole   I used https://github.com/openzipkin/brave-webmvc-example webMvc4 to upload data to server   , then it reported jsonformat error .  I used java  not  Php .
if you are using a recent commit of that, it should send json in v2 format by default. I will double-check now.
actually your molten config will not work with v2 endpoint. please change it to v1 https://github.com/chuan-yun/Molten/issues/93

I can't see your exact errors. Look like your network is not good. Try to open VPN, or replace `install --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/` to taobao's mirror, which in `apm-webapp/pom.xml`.

@wu-sheng  I have changed the apm-webapp/pom.xml   .But the error still occur  . Also  I don't know  why the error info can't show .   
`mvn clean package -DskipTests` this is the code I used
Have you changed to new mirror address? This build failure is definitely caused by network problem.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6898355/43390750-89867d46-9421-11e8-8315-4e6745be1369.png)

Maybe you need to redo `git clone` from the beginning, I guess you have damaged files.

You may choose to use `mvn -x ....` to see what is really happening.

@wu-sheng   `mvn clean package -DskipTests -X `   
like this  ?  Is it upper case letter ‘X‘?     I used ` mvn clean package -DskipTests -e`  before  .it still  had not error detail info .
You're right. Thanks for you correction!

We have already provided the document: https://github.com/apache/incubator-skywalking/blob/master/docs/en/Component-libraries-extend.md
Did you find anything?

1. Why do you try to jump to 1000 pages? This is an unusual usage.
1. What do you mean `incorrectly`? Too slow or something else?

I just try to jump to 1001 page, and the web ui give me error notice.
Msg:
UI
- Exception while fetching data (/queryBasicTraces) : all shards failed
It should be restrictions on ES ,due to "start + size " larger than 10000

> It should be restrictions on ES ,due to "start + size " larger than 10000

In most cases, this means ES can't support this payload. If you have more ES shardings, or you have the more powerful machine, maybe work out.
You need to reboot your application under monitoring. Not just collector.
How about the status? Hope we can include this in RC release.

please give your spring-cloud-netflix version and all the related spring configuration, aspectj configuration such as hystrixCommandAnnotationPointcut
This is nothing about the `apm-spring-annotation-plugin`. This exception means agent can't connect or uplink data to backend/collector.
may be apm-spring-annotation-plugin  create much more spans. I have tried it many times，remove this  plugin everything is ok,    after adding  exceptions will occur

> may be apm-spring-annotation-plugin create much more spans. I have tried it many times，remove this plugin everything is ok, after adding exceptions will occur

No. I am pretty sure, this error is nothing about the plugin. If spans trigger something wrong, should have collector side's log or memory related error.

gRPC transports bytes to backend, even don't know the span concept.

adding this plugin there is another exception when  start  app with agent:
```  
WARN  TracingContext :  More than 300 spans required to create
java.lang.RuntimeException: Shadow tracing context. Thread dump
        at org.apache.skywalking.apm.agent.core.context.TracingContext.isLimitMechanismWorking(TracingContext.java:515)
        at org.apache.skywalking.apm.agent.core.context.TracingContext.createLocalSpan(TracingContext.java:290)
        at org.apache.skywalking.apm.agent.core.context.ContextManager.createLocalSpan(ContextManager.java:110)
        at org.apache.skywalking.apm.plugin.spring.annotations.SpringAnnotationInterceptor.beforeMethod(SpringAnnotationInterceptor.java:32)
        at org.apache.skywalking.apm.agent.core.plugin.interceptor.enhance.InstMethodsInter.intercept(InstMethodsInter.java:89)
        at springfox.documentation.schema.property.ObjectMapperBeanPropertyNamingStrategy.nameForDeserialization(ObjectMapperBeanPropertyNamingStrategy.java)
        at springfox.documentation.schema.property.BeanPropertyDefinitions.name(BeanPropertyDefinitions.java:48)
        at springfox.documentation.schema.property.OptimizedModelPropertiesProvider.beanModelProperty(OptimizedModelPropertiesProvider.java:281)

That [warn] means you are trying to create over 300 spans in a single segment. I wonder this is your real purpose. It is very dangerous for your memory.
These are automatically generated. what should I do?

> These are automatically generated. what should I do?

I don't know what does your application do, and why do you have so many spans in a single request. Only you or your team can say this is reasonable or some incompatible bug. I don't know, sorry.
Are you ready to run the auto test again?
